columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the domain. For public hosted zones, this is the name that is registered with your DNS registrar.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The ID that Amazon Route 53 assigned to the hosted zone when it was created.

columns.name: caller_reference
columns.description: The value that you specified for CallerReference when you created the hosted zone.

columns.name: private_zone
columns.description: If true, the zone is Private hosted Zone, otherwise it is public.

columns.name: linked_service_principal
columns.description: If the health check or hosted zone was created by another service, the service that created the resource.

columns.name: linked_service_description
columns.description: If the health check or hosted zone was created by another service, an optional description that can be provided by the other service.

columns.name: resource_record_set_count
columns.description: The number of resource record sets in the hosted zone.

columns.name: query_logging_configs
columns.description: A list of configuration for DNS query logging that is associated with the current AWS account.

columns.name: dnssec_key_signing_keys
columns.description: The key-signing keys (KSKs) in AWS account.

columns.name: vpcs
columns.description: The list of VPCs that are authorized to be associated with the specified hosted zone.

columns.name: resource_record_set_limit
columns.description: The maximum number of resource record sets allowed in the hosted zone.
